vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Reuben living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.9;
son of: Reuben (H7205);
brother of: Hanoch (H2585J), Hezron (H2696) and Carmi (H3756);
father of: Eliab (H0446H)
Group of pal.lu (פַּלּוּא "Pallu" H6396)
§ Palluites = see Pallu "wonderful"
descendants of Pallu, the 2nd son of Reuben
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Falú, hijo de Rubén
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
法路族 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 法路 "美妙的"
流便次子法路的後裔(民 26:5)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
法路族 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 见 法路 "美妙的"
流便次子法路的后裔(民 26:5)
